entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
